titleStmt.title: Notes on Mr. F.D.'s Result of a dialogue concerning the middle state of souls in a letter from Thomas White.
titleStmt.author: White, Thomas, 1593-1676.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A65798 of text R27876 in the English Short Title Catalog (Wing W1838). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
